TopicTitle: Not enough stage info in VAB

Articles.Content:
As part of trying to problem solve something else (an issue with my hydrogen tanks running empty too quickly!), I found that there doesn't seem to be enough info in the VAB for each stage. It seems that I can only find "start" as in starting mass, delta V and TWR, and maybe burn time, I can't remember. There's only 3 or 4 things anyway. The font is also barely readable and too small but that's a different issue.  In KSP1, for each stage you could see deltaV, Isp (useful if you are using more than one type of engine in a single stage), Thrust, TWR, start mass, end mass and burn time. 

Edited March 18 by allanp11
